protein.specific_function: TRAP proteins are part of a complex whose function is to bind calcium to the ER membrane and thereby regulate the retention of ER resident proteins

reference.reference_text: Holthuis JC, van Riel MC, Martens GJ: Translocon-associated protein TRAP delta and a novel TRAP-like protein are coordinately expressed with pro-opiomelanocortin in Xenopus intermediate pituitary. Biochem J. 1995 Nov 15;312 ( Pt 1):205-13.
